problem_statement: Predict customer churn for an e-commerce business using historical transaction behavior to enable proactive retention strategies.

dataset.name: Online Retail II Dataset
dataset.granularity: Transactional data aggregated to customer level

churn_definition.definition: A customer is labeled as churned if they make no purchases within a 120-day observation window following the training cutoff date.

modeling.validation_strategy: Strict temporal split with leakage-safe feature engineering and 5-fold stratified cross-validation

business_impact.objective: Reduce customer churn through early identification of high-risk customers
business_impact.expected_benefit: Improved customer retention with favorable cost-benefit tradeoff by prioritizing recall of churners
